item.title: Install Git
item.description: Git can be installed on the most common operating systems like Windows, Mac, and Linux. In fact, Git comes installed by default on most Mac and Linux machines! Checking for Git To see if you already have Git installed, open up your terminal application. If you’re on a Mac, look for a command prompt application called Terminal. If you’re on a Windows machine, open the windows command prompt or Git Bash.
